Terrorsaur:





Terrorsaur kept watching the shadows, slowly begining to back up from 
the forest. He stumbled a few times, finding that his left foot was 
damaged from Rowdy Wolf's encounter. Something was going on near-by. 
He could hear it. He couldn't turn his back on him yet, he could fire 
on him, causing more damage than he already had. 

He kept backing up, watching Rowdy Wolf's fading figure as he finally 
made his way out of the forest. He looked around.
